comment.author: 55198937@N05
comment._content: The USS Astoria saw action in a number of Pacific war zones, including the Battle of the Coral Sea, and was eventually sunk in the Battle of Savo Island off the Solomon Islands August 1943. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_Astoria_(CA-34)

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/angeljim46] Thank you for that information AndyBrii, we will be uploading more photographs from the USS ASTORIA visit to Sydney so please stay tuned!
